event.name: TEST_HEKTAR_STORE
event.text: Demo Store.

event.name: HEKTAR_HEADQUARTERS
event.text: 이 조난 신호는 당신을 예상치 못한 곳으로 데려갔습니다. 무성한 테라포밍 천국, 그 중심에는 헥타르 HQ 외에 다른 곳이 없는 거대한 고리 모양의 건축물이 있었습니다. 이상하게도 조난 신호는 몇 가지 특정 주파수에서만 방송되고 있으며, 그 중 하나는 비밀스러운 연합 채널이었습니다.
당신이 HQ 착륙 패드에 착륙하는 동안, 경비들이나 검문소 같은 것이 어디에도 없다는 사실에 놀랐습니다. 그러나 건물에 가까이 가보니 다소 위험해 보이는 보안 시스템에 의해 접근이 차단되어 있습니다.
진입을 시도하려 하니 알람이 울리고 배를 공격하는 보안 포탑이 작동했습니다! 다행히도 당신은 그것들을 끄고 다시 들어 올 수 있었지만, 당신의 함선은 상당한 피해를 받았습니다.

choice.text: (고급 해킹 장비) 접근 권한을 얻으려 시도한다.

event.text: 이런 외진 곳에서 신호가 발신 되고 있다는 것은 굉장히 수상합니다. 아마 함정이라고 밖에 생각 할 수 없겠죠? 당신은 떠날 준비를 했습니다.

event.name: BILLY
event.text: 진입 시도는 성공했습니다. 건물 내부를 둘러보니, 상황이 좋지 않아 보입니다. 희미한 핏자국이 벽을 장식하고 있고, 죽은 슬러그들에게서 나온 것 같은 초록색 점액이 가득했습니다. 말라붙은 핏자국으로 보아 몇주쯤 지난 흔적으로 보이지만, 뭔가 끔찍한 것을 보게 될 거라는 불길한 예감을 지울 수 없습니다.

적어도, 사무실 문은 평범하게 열고 지나갈 수 있었습니다. 당신은 그 안에서 책상 너머에 주저앉아 조용히 흐느끼고 있는 파란색 슬러그를 찾았습니다. 그는 당신을 보자 벌떡 일어서더니 충격, 공포, 분노, 그리고 패배까지 잇달아 태도가 변했습니다. "그래써, 끝내 날 쭉이러 온 건가? 만기일이 됐다는 건 알고 있어.... 그래, 너네가 이겨써. 이쩨 포기할레. 날 그냥 쭉여."

choice.text: 당신은 누구입니까? 누가 당신을 죽이려 하는겁니까?

event.text: 그 슬러그는 당신이 예상외의 인물임을 깨달은 것처럼 보입니다. "짬깐 넌 타우루쓰가 아니짢아! 난 쌀아써! 쌀아따고! 만쎄! 쩐 헥타르 싼업의 짱업짜인 칼 헥타르의 쏜짜이며 현 헥타르 최고경영짜인 빌리 헥타르입니다! 역씨 누군가 구쪼 씬호를 볼 쭐 알아써요! 불행하게도, 쩐 찌난 한달간 쩨 싸무씰 안에 갇혀 마찌 쪼찍폭력배쩌럼 회싸를 운영해야 해씁니다..."
"네? 그건 무쓴 멍쩡한 소리쬬. 헥타르는 항쌍 약쏘했는데, 쩌와 쩨 동쌩이 회싸를 물려받았을 때 우린 이 회싸를 말 그대로 빛이 나게 만들고 싶었씁니다! 하지만 이내 쭐피콰르가 나타나써 무기 싼업을 독쩜해 버렸씁니다. 쩐 어떻게든 회싸를 쌀리려 했찌만 쩨 동생은 쩨 방식을 껄끄러워 했씁니다. 원씨쩍인 도마뱀들을 짭아다 부리는게 그렇게 짤못된 일인가요?"

choice.text: 그게 사무실에 갇힌 것과 어떤 관련이 있는지 모르겠는데요.

event.text: "거의 다 썰명해쓰니, 쪼금만 기다리쎄요! 쩨 동쌩이 회싸를 나간 뒤... 아, 싸씰 쩨가 강쩨로 쫓아낸 거찌만요. 하찌만 요쩜은 그게 아닙니다! 그 이후로도 쌍황이 쩜쩜 나빠져서 배당금을 마련하찌 못할 찌경까지 갔고 결국 투짜짜들이 한 명씩 떠나기 씨짝했씁니다. 곧, 느글느글한 이름을 가진 토니 시니어라는 리치와 바엘이라는 개자식만이 남았씁니다."
"모든 은하 용병들의 우두머리를 말하씨는 거쬬? 네, 바로 그 싸람입니다. 아, 그러고 보니 당씬이 이 씨썰에 들어온 씨쩜에서 그에게 알림이 가쓸 거고, 우리 둘 모두를 쭉이기 위해 암쌀자가 보내쪄쓸 겁니다. 미리 알려드렸습니다."
당신은 서둘러 사무실을 빠져나가다 당신의 함선 옆에 두 번째 함선이 착륙하는 것을 보고 멈췄습니다. 거대하고 스텔스기처럼 생긴 함선, 그리고 그 옆에는 MFK제복 차림의 인간이 서 있습니다. "멋진 함선을 가지고 있구만 형씨. 순순히 그 슬러그를 넘기기만 하면 아무도 다치지 않을 거야."

남자는 어떻게 반응해야 할지 고민하는 것처럼 보였습니다. "나는 타우루스다. 바엘의 '집행자'들 중 하나지. 너 같은 사람들은 우리를 죽음의 천사라고 부르더군. 딱 맞는 이름이지?" 그는 빌리쪽으로 주의를 돌렸습니다. "이제 빌스터 너는 끝났어. 바엘이 네 말장난에 지쳤거든. 그를 상대로 약속을 어기면 어떻게 되는지 똑똑히 보여주지" 그가 다시 당신에게 말했습니다. "마지막으로 말하겠다. 그 슬러그만 넘기면 아무 일도 없었던 것처럼 헤어질 수 있어."
타우루스는 의기양양하게 웃으며 조롱하듯 악수를 한 뒤 빌리에게 수갑을 채우고 그의 함선으로 데려갔습니다. "두말할 나위도 없지만, 우리가 다시 마주치지 않았으면 좋겠군 형씨. 네 머리에 엄청난 현상금이 걸려있거든. 솔직히 그걸 지금 노리지 않는다니 용병으로써 실격감이지..."
"아 오히려 좋아. 난 사실 네가 거절하기를 바라고 있었어. 네 머리통에 걸린 달달한 현상금이 탐났거든." 타우루스는 위협적으로 웃으며 이미 엔진이 켜진 그의 함선으로 달려갔습니다. 일이 쉽게 흘러가진 않을 것 같습니다.
당신은 이 사람이 누군지 모르고 신경도 쓰지 않았습니다. 하지만 자신을 죽여달라고 하는군요. 부탁 받은 대로 해줘야 겠지요? 당신은 이야기를 듣자마자 슬러그의 미간에 블래스터를 쐈고 그의 머리에서 튀어나온 녹색 점액이 벽에 칠해졌습니다. 이 미스터리가 끝난 것 같군요.

event.name: BILLY_SAVE
event.text: With Billy now safe, you take one last trip past the wreckage. To your surprise, you dig out what appears to be a highly advanced weapon powered by bizarrely foreign yet similar tech. You aren't sure where it's from, but you'll take it. Billy also has a team come in to scan the ship and retrieve its blueprint, which will make a fine addition to your hangar.

Billy seems to be making himself comfortable in your ship's lounge. "I think nowsss asss good of a time asss any for old Billy to take a relaxing vacation from all of thisss chaossss. And taxesss. Sssay, ssstranger, where you headed?"

choice.text: We're off to save all of reality from the interdimensional Rebellion.

event.text: "O-oh. Wait... interdimensssional heroesss probably don't pay their taxessss, do they? Hahah baby, no more taxesss here I come! Oh, and sssaving reality issss cool too, I guessss."

choice.text: One last thing - what about our debt?

event.text: "Right... right... Yeah I can take care of that, fair isss fair. You know, it might be a good idea to let everyone here go now. Thisss will be a PR disssasster if it ever got out..."

event.name: BILLY_DEAD
event.text: 빌리가 어디로 갔는지 알아보기 위해 선내를 둘러보았지만 그는 전투에서 살아남지 못한 것 같습니다. 당분간 그 빚을 갚지 않아도 될 것 같군요...

You make one last trip back to the Angel's ship, and see what you might find inside. To your surprise, you dig out what appears to be a highly advanced weapon powered by bizzarely foreign yet similar tech. You aren't sure where it's from, but you'll take it.

event.name: HEKTAR_SHIPYARDS
event.text: 도약 후 신호소가 별볼일 없어 보인다고 느끼던 찰나 지상에 떠 있는 거대한 구체형 조선소를 발견했습니다. 더 자세히 살펴보니 그 아래에는 적어도 성간 항해를 할 정도의 기술력을 가진 것 같지는 않은 종족의 일종의 낙후된 마을이 있는 것 같습니다...

마을은 도마뱀 형태의 생물로 북적입니다. 이전에 헥타르 함선에서 일하는 이 종족들을 보았지만 이곳이 원래 그들이 사는 곳임에 틀림없습니다. 매우 이상하게도 조선소로 접근 할 수록 더 많은 도마뱀 생물체들이 있었습니다. 양복과 뒤로 묶은 넥타이를 한 주황색 안경 도마뱀이 피켓 표시와 무장한 무기를 들고 화난 도마뱀 무리를 진정시키려고 확성기로 소리를 지르고 있습니다.

군중의 눈에 띄지 않게 근처에 배를 착륙시켰습니다. 관리자 도마뱀이 당신에게 다가오는 중에도 군중들이 그에게 "배신자" 라고 하는 등의 성난 외침을 퍼붓고 있었습니다. "네, 네, 안녕하세요. 저는 이 시설의 관리자이자 도마뱀 인구 통계를 관리하는 Metyunt입니다." 타오르는 돌이 근처로 날아오고, 일부 도마뱀 폭도들이 근처의 헥타르 함선을 박살내고 있는 와중에도 Metyunt는 태연한 표정으로 안경을 다시 고쳐쓰며 말했습니다. 또한 군중 위를 맴도는 매우 큰 슬러그 선박도 볼 수 있었습니다. 아직 발포하지는 않았지만 군중이 일을 너무 밀어붙이면 슬러그들이 그들을 진압하려고 계획을 세운 것 같습니다.

"네, 당신이 실제로 장님이 아니어서 다행입니다. 이런 폭동은 흔한 일이지만, 당신이 무엇을 할 수 있겠습니까? 내가 '내 종족을 회사에 팔았기' 때문에 그들은 나를 배신자라고 부릅니다. 하지만 다른 관점으로 본다면, 나는 그들에게 호의를 베풀어 여기로 데려왔습니다. 이곳에 오지 않았다면 그들은 여전히 고향 성단에서 불결한 삶을 살고 있었을 것이며, 새로운 로스쿨이나 뭔가를 위한 공간을 만들기 위해 행성을 밀어버리려는 정신나간 졸탄 정치가의 불가피한 희생자가 될 것입니다." Metyunt는 안약 한 병에 손을 뻗어 눈에 떨어뜨립니다. 그런 다음 외계 과일이 날아오는 것을 보고 몸을 웅크렸습니다.

choice.text: 자기 종족을 배신했다고?! 시위대 편에 선다.

event.text: "뭐하는 겁니까? 당신 미쳤습니까?" 당신은 단상에서 내려와 시위대와 함께 구호를 외치기 시작했습니다. 연방 선장의 지원을 본 도마뱀들이 난리를 피우고 헥타르 함선이 이내 공격을 시작했습니다. 전투 직전에, 당신은 헥타르 함선에 발포하지 말라고 요청하는 Metyunt를 확실히 보았지만 그들은 듣지 않았습니다. 당신이 나서서 이들을 보호해야 할 것 같습니다!

choice.text: 그들이 장님인 것 같군요. 당신 말이 맞습니다. Metyunt와 함께한다.

event.text: 연방 공무원이 개입하면 사람들이 더 잘 듣는 경향이 있습니다. 당신은 우아한 연설로 시간을 낭비하지 않으려 합니다. 그 정도는 Metyunt도 할 수 있습니다. 대신에 군중들이 집으로 돌아가도록 격려하고 상황이 나빠지지 않도록 했습니다. 그들은 마지못해 응하고 흩어졌습니다. Metyunt는 당신에게 멋쩍게 감사를 표하고 보상을 제공했습니다.

choice.text: 이건 우리 일이 아니다. 개입하지 않는다.

event.text: 궁금하긴 했지만, 여기에 당신에게 필요한 것이 있을 가능성은 거의 없다고 생각했습니다.

event.name: METYUNT
event.text: 배를 돌려 조선소로 돌아갔습니다. 전투가 진행되는 동안 폭도들이 지역의 상당 부분을 장악한 것으로 보이지만, Metyunt와 나머지 헥타르 스태프들은 반발하고 있습니다. 당신이 개입하지 않으면 이것은 또 다른 총격전으로 끝날 수도 있습니다.
Looks like things are tense. The Hektar employees look ready to fire, and you suspect Metyunt's reluctance is the only thing keeping them on hold.

choice.text: 군중들에게 그들이 옳았음을 증명했으니 해산해야 한다고 설득한다.

event.text: 당신의 주장은 매우 설득력이 없는 것 같았습니다. 혼돈이 일어나고 당신의 승무원은 총격전 속에 목숨을 잃었습니다!

removeCrew.text: 다행스럽게도 당신의 승무원은 소생할 수 있었지만, 돌아가서 이야기하기에는 너무 늦었습니다.

event.text: Metyunt는 머뭇거렸지만 곧 그의 부하들에게 조선소에서 대피하라는 명령을 내립니다. 그는 도마뱀들에게 붙잡혀 격납고로 돌아왔고 그를 어떻게 해야 할지 의논했습니다.

choice.text: 그는 두 번째 기회를 가질 자격이 있습니다.

event.text: 도마뱀들은 불평했지만 당신이 그들을 얼마나 도왔는가를 생각한다면 더 이상 따지지 않을 것입니다. Metyunt는 아직 사지가 찢어지지 않았다는 사실에 충격을 받은 것 같습니다. "음, 어, 어, 여기 어딘가에 도덕이 있는 것 같아요. 자기 종족 전체를 노예로 팔지 않는다? 그것 참 좋은 얘기인것 같군요..."

choice.text: 그에겐 기회가 있었습니다. 더 이상은 없습니다.

event.text: 도마뱀들은 동의했고 Metyunt는 처형되었습니다. 당신은 일이 그 정도 까지 갈 것이라고 예상하지 않았지만 지금은 너무 늦어버렸습니다. 도마뱀들은 새로 찾은 자유에 환호를 했지만, 당신이 떠나고 헥타르에서 증원을 보내면 자유가 지속되지 않을 수도 있습니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 도마뱀들은 감사해하며 다른 헥타르 함선에서 "빌려온" 보상을 제공했습니다.

choice.text: 무기를 꺼내 양쪽 모두에게 무기를 내려놓으라고 요구한다.

event.text: 대담하고도, 어리석은 행동이었습니다. 선원이 이제 자신과 노출된 무기에 주의를 기울이는 순간 지옥이 풀려나고 당신의 선원은 총격전 속에 목숨을 잃었습니다!

removeCrew.text: 다행스럽게도 당신의 승무원은 소생할 수 있었지만, 돌아가서 이야기하기에는 너무 늦었습니다.

choice.text: 위험을 감수할 순 없다. 전리품만 챙기고 떠난다.

event.name: METYUNT_UNLOCK
event.text: 도마뱀들이 Metyunt를 가까이 하고 싶지 않는 것이 분명합니다. 당신은 그를 이 섹터의 다른 곳으로 데려다 주겠다고 제안하지만 그는 거절합니다. "다른 직업을 찾는 게 나을 것 같습니다. 내가 그만뒀으니 헥타르는 내 도움 없이도 일을 처리해야 할 겁니다. 이제 저는 당신과 함께 해야할 것 같습니다. 아, 그리고 떠나기전에 보상을 하고 싶습니다..."

event.name: EXIT_HEKTAR
event.text: 당신은 마침내 이 무시무시한 섹터의 출구를 찾았습니다.
이 구역을 막 떠나려던 참에, 거대한 헥타르 함선이 당신을 멈춰 세웠습니다. "쬐쏭합니다. 하지만 이 쎅터를 떠나씰 쑤 없씁니다! 당씬은 아찍도 헥타르 싼업에 많은 비쯜 찌고 있씁니다!"

choice.text: 싸워서 길을 열어야 할 것 같군!

event.text: 이제 유일한 탈출구는 싸우는 것입니다! 무기에 전력을 공급하고 교전을 준비했습니다.
다행히 Billy가 돌아올 때까지 몇 분 밖에 걸리지 않았으며 이 섹터를 떠날 수 있었습니다. 그들은 당신의 함선에 주요 기업의 CEO가 타는 것에 대한 비용을 지불했습니다.
다행히 Metyunt가 돌아올 때까지 몇 분 밖에 걸리지 않았으며 이 섹터를 떠날 수 있었습니다. 그들은 당신의 함선에 주요 기업의 직원 관리자가 타는 것에 대한 비용을 지불했습니다.
Looks like the Rebel fleet has taken control of the beacon! You'll have to fight your way out!

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the Elite.

event.name: NEBULA_EXIT_HEKTAR
event.text: 당신은 출구를 발견했습니다 - 하지만 거대한 헥타르 함선이 길을 막고 있군요. "쬐쏭합니다. 하지만 이 쎅터를 떠나씰 쑤 없씁니다! 당씬은 아찍도 헥타르 싼업에 많은 비쯜 찌고 있씁니다!"

choice.text: 싸워서 길을 열어야 할 것 같군!

Looks like the Rebel fleet has taken control of the beacon! You'll have to fight your way out!

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the Elite.

event.name: HEKTAR_INVESTOR
event.text: 근처에서 부유한 재벌의 함선이 신호소를 탐험하고 있었습니다. 흥미로운 얘기가 될 것 같습니다.
당신은 함선에서 멀리 떨어진 후 배에서 무언가를 할 수 있을 만한 다른 곳을 찾았습니다.

event.name: HEKTAR_INVESTOR_QUESTIONS_NOTMET
event.text: "Oh, chip chap cheerio good fellow! I am Count Dinkleman Reichster Von Applebuzz Tri Tri the Fourth, at your service. I have taken a long venture to these lands to see what treasures Hektar might have to offer me and my immense wealth. Tell me, good sir or madam, what are your opinions on Hektar?"

choice.text: They're tricking people into being trapped in this sector.

event.text: "Good heavens, what a genius idea! Forcing people into paying off an imaginary debt by trapping them in a massive market place, then hiding it in a nebula where the Federation will never find it? Delightful! I'm sure you think it's horrible though, because you aren't disgustingly rich. Anyways, thanks for the chat, gotta go!" The man sprints back to his ship, dropping several piles of scrap from his pockets as he goes.

"Oh, well you know what they say in 'the business'. Actually, I don't. I'm not in 'the business'. But somewhere, I'm sure they have some justfiable reasons for slavery. Clearly, you wouldn't know, because you aren't disgustingly rich. Anyways, thanks for the chat, gotta go!" The man sprints back to his ship, dropping several piles of scrap from his pockets as he goes.
"Just alright, eh? Well, what about their products? You have a large military vessel at your disposal. Do you enjoy the use of Hektar's signature modular weaponry?"

"Good you say? Marvelous! I'm no military man, but I'll take your word for it! I shall invest in Hektar. A remarkable chat, good fellow. Say, do me a service and take this worthless assistant of mine off of my hands. I think one of Hektar's lizard people will serve me better."

"Oh, well that's certainly not good. I'm no military man, but I'll take your word for it! I shall not invest in Hektar. Here, you can have this worthless piece of junk, considering I certainly won't want it."
"Well, then you are worthless to me. Imagine being so poor. Thanks for the chat, gotta go!" The man sprints back to his ship, dropping several piles of scrap from his pockets as he goes.

event.name: HEKTAR_INVESTOR_QUESTIONS_MET
event.text: "Strange poor person, we meet again! It is me, Count Dinkleman Reichster Von Applebuzz Tri Tri the Fourth! What a coincidence we happen upon each other on this occasion. I have taken a long venture to these lands to see what treasures Hektar might have to offer me and my immense wealth. Tell me, good sir or madam, what are your opinions on Hektar?"

event.name: DISTRESS_HEKTAR_GHETTO
event.text: The nearby planet boasts both a bustling ghetto full of lizards - and a pirate ship firing upon them! There's a good chance Hektar knows about this but doesn't care to intervene, so you might be their only hope!
You prepare to fight the pirate ship.
The lives of these lizards are nothing to you. Bah, let them all die for all you care.

event.name: HEKTAR_UNION
event.text: You're surprised to find a band of lizards aboard a nearby Hektar ship, unaccompanied by any Slugs. They hail you. "You are a military ship, right? I think you could be of assistance to us. Will you help?"

"We have begun the steps towards establishing a union that might finally make this place less of a hell to work at. Unfortunately, our boss refuses to even acknowledge our efforts. Will you help 'encourage' him for us? Just make sure you don't kill him, otherwise this will all have been pointless!"
The lizards show you where their boss is located and reinforce that you must not kill him.

choice.text: Reveal their plan to their manager.

event.text: The Slug laughs when he learns about the lizards' plan. "Hah, thossse idiotss don't even know how to wear a ssshirt the right way. Thanksss for telling me though, a good whippin' will do them good!" The greedy Slug doesn't even give you anything in return, but the lizards are furious and storm your ship!
The lizards make no further comment and go back to talking amongst themselves.

event.name: HEKTAR_SUZERAIN
event.text: You really can't say you expected to find a Suzerain ship so far out here, and you heavily doubt they're victims to Hektar. For what reasons might they have come?

The Suzerain responds, flailing his arms in several grand motions. "Greetings! You are hearing of the great Billy Hektar, yes? He is man of fewest ethics, leader of greatest and most morally bankrupt corporation in WHOLE Multiverse! I come to learn from him and master ways of becoming living scum myself! Have you heard his teachings?"
"I see you are having Slug one aboard your ship! Squishy men, but most natural commers of retched living! Honored I am, and giving you things."

"I see you are having Guild man aboard your ship! Hunter and poacher of sentient things, skinner of the living! Oh how I envy your nerves of steel and torturous methods of mutilation! Honored I am, and giving you things."
"I see you are having stealthy cloaking Slug aboard your ship! Cunning master of silent assassinations and devilish trickery! Oh, oh, how I hoping to learn! Yes, I coming with to learn from you!"

"I see you are having evilest taxidermy man aboard your ship! Master of sniping and knowledgeable in all forms of unethical biological weapons! Oh, oh, how I hoping to learn! Yes, I coming with to learn from you!"
"You are having one of Billy's own disciples! You are seeing oh great Billy in the flesh! I honored, truly! Please, allowing me to come and learn!"
"EEK! It is you! Most ungraceful one, Billy himself! I not knowing what to say, overcome with excitement! Please, allowing me to come with you, it would be biggest of honors!"
"Hah! Then you are stupid idiot! Biggest of fools, ethically driven and morally abundant! Hahahahah! The galaxy needing less of you, so I doing that."
There's no sane reason to go interacting with Suzerains unless you want to risk having your head removed. You put a large distance between your ships just in case.

event.name: NEBULA_DISTRESS_CRISIS
event.text: You see the distress call at this beacon, but you see no ship in distress. Instead, a lizard piloting a cargo ship hails you.

"I am in distress! Oh, horrible horrible. Not the kind of distress you are thinking of, no. I am in despair! I think I am having a mental breakdown! What is life? All I know is work. All I do is work. I know nothing but work. Is there more to life but an endless cycle of work?"

choice.text: No. You either work, or you become obsolete.

event.text: "Oh, then let me choose obsoletion! I quit!" The Lizard opens all of the airlocks aboard his ship, venting him, the rest of the crew, and the entire cargo. It's quite morbid, but it won't stop you from swooping in and stealing some of the crates.

choice.text: Yes. Work hard enough and eventually you'll be free from the cycle.

event.text: "You mean there is freedom? The metaphorical pot of gold at the end of the metaphorical rainbow? Then I shall seek that gold! You have given me hope! Thank you captain!" The Lizard offers you a drone from the cargo.

choice.text: (Monk Crew) "Life is a cycle yes - but which cycle you follow is up to you."

event.text: "I have a choice? I thought Hektar was all there was. That's what they told me - the rest of the galaxy was a barren wasteland and this was the last sector alive. But wait... you're from out there! I must come with you and taste freedom at long last!"

choice.text: (Free Mantis Crew) "Status Quo is only what big man upstair wanting you to follow!"

event.text: "I have a choice? I thought Hektar was all there was. That's what they told me - the rest of the galaxy was a barren wasteland and this was the last sector alive. But wait... you're from out there! I must come with you and taste freedom at long last!"
The lizard has already broken out into full on sobbing and barely hears your lame excuse to leave.

event.name: NEBULA_DISTRESS_DEBTORS
event.text: The distress call appears to originate from a ship, lost in the clouds. "Please, help us! We are in debt to Hektar, but our chances of paying it off are hopeless! Is there anything you can spare us?"

choice.text: Give them a small amount of scrap. [-15~]

event.text: With such a small amount, you'd expect the ship to take it as an insult. Instead, they seem grateful. "Thank you so much! It is so little, yes, but any amount of generosity increases our chances of getting out of here." The civilians cannot pay you in scrap, so they offer you an upgrade to your life support instead.

choice.text: Give them a large amount of scrap. [-50~]

event.text: The civilians are shocked you'd offer them so much money. "T-thank you so much! This will help tremendously." Obviously, the civilians cannot reward you with a donation of scrap, so they repay you with detailed sector mappings they've collected from their extensive time here, as well as a reactor upgrade and some fuel.

choice.text: These guys are a good target. Attack!

event.text: You raise your weapons and attack the ship.
Unfortunately, these civilians will have to rely on other means to save themselves. Knowing how this sector is a giant trap, it's unlikely they'll find any other vessel willing to help.

event.name: NEBULA_DISTRESS_HEKTAR_CHILDREN
event.text: A Hektar distress beacon is coming from this beacon. From the looks of it, it appears a crowd of Slugs has gathered at an Hektar factory.

The factory owner appears to be a frustrated and middle-aged Slug. In the background, hundreds of Slug children toil away working the machines. "Ugh, for years we've been running Hektar with thossse lizard freakssss. But when I decccide I want to ssstart ussssing children to run my facccilitiessss, NOW people freak out? Jeez, what issss wrong with people..."

choice.text: Assist the factory owners and disperse the protestors.
Assist the protestors and liberate the children.

event.text: You power up your weapons and attack the Hektar factory. A ship arrives to stop you.

choice.text: Pay the factory owner to free the children.

event.text: The Slug is reluctant to turn over his workers, but he seems to see the logic in your offer and accepts it. The children are set free and the jubilant protestors reward you.

choice.text: Ignore their gift, take one of the children, and quickly leave.

event.text: Looks like things could turn ugly fast. Better if you don't get involved.

The crowd is put down easily. Not willing to reinforce their thoughts with a counter attack, the Slugs leave and the factory owner pays you. You are now an official supporter of forced child labor, congratulations!

Looks like the protestors are more willing to defend their thoughts than you expected. A few shots dent your hull, but fortunately it's not too bad. Seeing their attacks were mostly ineffective, the protestors give up and the factory owner pays you. You are now an official supporter of forced child labor, congratulations!

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_SYLVAN
event.text: "Sssstranger, welcome to my beacon!" You jump, thinking you've somehow found Sylvan yet again, but instead it seems this is just another Hektar employee, not the infamous traveling merchant.

choice.text: Why are you pretending to be Sylvan?

event.text: "Well, Sssylvan isss my hero! He'ssss sso cool. And hot. I wisssh I wasss that cool and hot... Pardon the oxymoron."
The Slug perks up. "In fact, I do!" He resumes his impersonation from before. "Come on in sssstranger, and take a look at my goodssss!"

choice.text: You're missing the 8 shields and 6 Burst Lasers.

event.text: "Yeah... I'm not even sssure how he got thossse! Every time I try to inssstall that many ssshields I jussst get an obnoxious beep like I've hit a hardcoded limit or sssomething."

choice.text: Offer him some scrap to spruce up his ship.

event.text: "That'ssss quite generoussss, ssstranger! Uh, I mean, thankssss."
"Oh man, I don't have anything to give... wait, no! I do! Thissss isss very valuable to me, but I'm sssure you'll get a lot more ussse out of it than me. Pleasssse take good care of it though."
The Slug perks up. "In fact, I do!" He resumes his impersonation from before. "Come on in sssstranger, and take a look at my goodssss!"
"OH GOD! IT'SSS YOU! OH MY OH MY OH MY OH MY OH MY!" The Slug practically demands that you allow him on the ship so that he can work alongside Sylvan.
You aren't sure why someone would try to immitate Sylvan, but it's nothing more than a nuisance to you.

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_TOYS
event.text: A small Hektar run gift-shop is nearby. It's highly unlikely it's carrying any military goods, but maybe you'll find something interesting inside?

You're welcomed by an overweight Slug. "Visssitorssss! Come on in! I have ssssomething to ssshow you! I've created a new line of pull-ssstring toysss resssembling variousss racccesss accrosss the galaxy. Come and try them!"

The human toy squeaks, and spits out "Glory to the Rebellion!" The Slug notices your shock and tries to calm your nerves. "It'sss okay! A lot humans are Rebelsss, that'sss the point! It'ss relatable for humansss!"

The Slug laughs nervously. "I'm guesssing you don't like it then? *Sigh*, okay..." The Slug slithers back to the store counter, defeated. "There'sss a military depot not too far from here. Go there inssstead if you want sssomething wortwhile..."

"You actually like it? OH BOY! Thank you ssso much! My brother tried to ssstart a plusssshie line in the EHG and thingsss haven't been going well for him, ssso I can't wait to tell him that good newsss! Wait, better yet, I'll come with you, and then I can ssssell my toysss to the whole Multiverssse!"
Your crew explains their opinions on the toy. The Slug thoughtfully contemplates this advice, and seems grateful. "Thank you ssso much for your input! Here, have thisss!"

The Mantis toy squeaks, and spits out "Kill all living things!" The Slug notices your shock and tries to calm your nerves. "It'sss okay! Mantisss are jussst like that! It'sss not offensssive if it'ssss true, right?"

The Slug laughs nervously. "I'm guesssing you don't like it then? *Sigh*, okay..." The Slug slithers back to the store counter, defeated. "There'sss a military depot not too far from here. Go there inssstead if you want sssomething wortwhile..."

"You actually like it? OH BOY! Thank you ssso much! My brother tried to ssstart a plusssshie line in the EHG and thingsss haven't been going well for him, ssso I can't wait to tell him that good newsss! Wait, better yet, I'll come with you, and then I can ssssell my toysss to the whole Multiverssse!"
Your crew explains their opinions on the toy. The Slug thoughtfully contemplates this advice, and seems grateful. "Thank you ssso much for your input! Here, have thisss!"

The Shell toy squeaks, and spits out "Racism is good!" The Slug notices your shock and tries to calm your nerves. "It'sss okay! Sssshellsss usssse racccissssm to organize their ssspeciesss! They're sssmart, ssso clearly they've figured sssomething out! It'sss the context that makesss it okay!"

The Slug laughs nervously. "I'm guesssing you don't like it then? *Sigh*, okay..." The slug slithers back to the store counter, defeated. "There'sss a military depot not too far from here. Go there inssstead if you want sssomething wortwhile..."

"You actually like it? OH BOY! Thank you ssso much! My brother tried to ssstart a plusssshie line in the EHG and thingsss haven't been going well for him, ssso I can't wait to tell him that good newsss! Wait, better yet, I'll come with you, and then I can ssssell my toysss to the whole Multiverssse!"
Your crew explains their opinions on the toy. The Slug thoughtfully contemplates this advice, and seems grateful. "Thank you ssso much for your input! Here, have thisss!"
You're on an important mission, no time to stop by worthless tourist traps like this.

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_HOPE
event.text: A civilian ship is here, wandering through the clouds, lost and afraid. Their captain perks up when he sees you. "The Federation has arrived?! I thought we'd be trapped here forever indebted to these Slugs bastards!"

choice.text: Confess the truth - the Federation has no idea about this place.
Lie - promise them the Federation has arrived to help.

event.text: "Then we are saved! This is a glorious day, liberation at last! I cannot offer much, but please, take this fuel!"

choice.text: (Soldier Crew) We did not come here to stop Hektar - but we will do our best now that we are here.

event.text: "Wow! So noble! But, for you to do anything you'll have to make it out of here alive. Let me see if I can help you with that!" The civilian ship patches up some of the damage to your hull.

"So the Federation has abandoned us? What happened to their oath to protect the galaxy? How can they just let these atrocities be commited every day and do nothing? The Federation is worthless..." The civilians jump away.

"But you ARE a Federation ship, right? That means you can do something! You can tell them about here! But to do that, you'll have to make it out alive. Here, let me see if I can help with that." The civilian ship patches up some of the damage to your hull.
"Oh... Well I suppose you're still a good chance for me to get the hell out of here. Please, take me with you, I want to be free from this hell!"

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_FANATIC
event.text: Looks like a group of civilians, likely victims of Hektar as well, are trapped inside an abandoned warehouse, being guarded by a set of fellow, well armed civilians. Their leader is a bulky human with a bright blue mohawk and the Hektar logo tatooed on both of his arms.

Before you're allowed to enter the warehouse, you're stopped by the same man you saw earlier. "YOU! YOOUUUUUUUU! ARE YOU LOYAL TO THE ONE, THE ONLY, HEKTAR? DO YOU GROVEL AT THE FEET OF THE GREAT HEKTAR CLAN? YES OR NO?"

"YEEEEESSSSS! YEEEEEEESSSSS! ONE OF US, ONE OF US, ONE OF US!!! WOOOOOOOO!" This guy is obviously a massive nutjob and probably has Stockholm syndrome of some sort, but he seems to welcome you amongst his ranks and leads you inside the building where the civilians are trapped.

"These are the heretics whom I have captured, and shall SACRIFICE IN THE NAME OF HEKTAR! They actually want to LEAVE! There shall be no LEAVING this place. We must stay, and dedicate our lives and our wallets to HEKTAR!"

choice.text: These guys have to be stopped!

event.text: Once it becomes clear you've turned on them, the burly man calls for one of his guards to attack you!

choice.text: Nod your head and get the hell out.

event.text: "THEN BEGONE, SCUM!" The man slams the door to the warehouse on you, locking you out.
This looks like chaos, the kind of chaos you don't want to be a part of. You distance yourself from the crazed civilians.

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_POWERPLANT
event.text: This beacon appears to be covered in an ion storm. However, the lightning here appears to be striking in unusual patterns. An Orchid ship is nearby as well, observing the clouds.

"Oh, hello. I am professor Ithen, a nebula biologist. You wouldn't believe the kinds of strange creatures these nebulas host! Unfortunately, it looks like Hektar's power generating facilities are manufacturing synthetic ion storms, which is very deadly for these creatures! I've already found 3 or so dead space whales, and this cannot be allowed to continue! Could you try and talk to the manager of the nearby powerplant?"

Looks like the facility in question has several massive tesla coils protruding from it, feeding off of the storm. The manager of the facility doesn't seem too receptive to the Orchid's message. "Bah, who caresss about ssssome ssstupid whale. Anaerobesss are lame! Just breathe oxygen, you losssersss."
If this guy won't listen to logic, then he'll have to listen to the sound of your guns!

choice.text: Help out the facility and attack the Orchids.

event.text: These Orchids are just being nosy, getting involved in business that doesn't concern them. Best you take them out.
You return to the Orchid and explain it didn't work. He seems disappointed in your lack of dedication, but thanks you for trying anyways and offers you a small reward.

choice.text: (Orchid Crew) Explain the importance of not harming ecosystems, regardless of where or what they are.

event.text: Your Orchid's speech only seems to confuse the Slug. "I don't underssstand a damn word you jussst sssaid, but it sssure wasss annoying asss hell. If you're sssaying there'sss more weirdosss like you that're going to bug me about thissss, then I'll ssstop jussst to shut you up."
"Marvelous work! I cannot thank you enough. I guess my work here is done. Unfortunately, I'm kind of stuck here. You know, massive debt and all that. Mind helping escort me out of this place?"
You don't want to linger any longer than you have to in an ion storm. These Orchids can keep doing whatever it is they're doing, you're out of here.

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_REFUEL
event.text: Looks like, curiously, a Hektar station is nearby, offering free refuelings to passing ships. Could it be that these Slugs aren't greedy like all the rest of this sector?
To your utter shock, the station welcomes you in and actually refuels your ship! You lean back in comfort, impressed by these Slugs.

As you attempt to leave, you're stopped by the Slugs. "Sssorry cussstomer, but you can't leave! You appear to be in debt to Hektar Indussstriesss, and thusss the free dissscount on thisss fuel hassss been rendered void. Assss such, your price now totalssss to around... all of your ssscrap. Pay up."
You aren't paying them all of your scrap! You'll have to fight your way out now.

choice.text: Pay them all of the scrap you have.

event.text: "Come again!" The Slugs wave you off as you fly away, empty pocketed.

The employees are shocked to see their CEO aboard your vessel. Once Billy is done reprimanding each staff member individualy, you're cleared to go, and are even offered supplies to make up for the "misssunderssstanding".

choice.text: (Upg. Engines) Hightail it out of there.

event.text: You power up your engines and fly away as fast as possible before the Slugs can even react.
You activate your cloaking system and sneak away from the Slugs.
No - this must be a trap. No way these guys are any different from the rest of this sector's inhabitants.

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_IKEA
event.text: A brightly colored civilian ship is stealthily hidden away near a Hektar platform. When you jump in, they seem to spot you quickly and hail.

"Hello, Federation captain! I am Astrid Kamprad. For many centuries my family has run a prominent furniture corporation in the Galactic Union, but to my horror when I heard news of Hektar, it would appear my family business's core idea has been shamelessly STOLEN by these devilish Hektars. I am certain there is proof of this locked away in a vault in that platform, but I need your help to get it. A station protects the vault, and I need it destroyed!"
As Astrid claimed, to access the platform, you'll first have to take out a Hektar station. Get ready to fight!

event.name: HEKTAR_IKEA_WIN
event.text: "You've done it captain! Now, let's crack open this vault and find the truth!"

After a little bit of a struggle, you get the vault open and enter. Inside are various documents and messily written letters, signed by a "Carle Hektar". Astrid explains Carle was the original founder of Hektar many many years ago before the Federation had even been founded.

At last, Astrid finds what he is looking for. A journal entry, which reads; "Today I visited Earth! I've always loved human culture. On my trip, I met this lovely gentleman who owned a furniture corporation. When I told him Slugs rarely furnished their homes, he was shocked! And then, the lad gave me a most brillant idea I'll never forget. He said I should start a furniture company myself! I owe everything to that man."
Astrid seems at a loss for words. "I... uh..." He clears his throat. "Well, I guess I better pay you for your help. I'm going to go cry in a bathroom now."

event.name: NEBULA_HEKTAR_PATENT
event.text: A Hektar ship and a Zoltan vessel look to be in some kind of standoff, arguing over trademarks. You can't seem to gleam any more insight on their argument, other than it seems very heated.

choice.text: Intervene and help the Hektar ship.

event.text: You engage the Zoltan ship.
You engage the Hektar ship.
You quickly fly away. Soon, both ships open fire at eachother.

textList.name: TEXT_ENCOUNTER_HEKTAR
textList.text: As you're starting to notice, the most prominent trait of all Hektar employees is their extreme greed. One particularly greedy Slug nearby looks to be wanting a piece of your ship and attacks!
A Hektar ship approaches, weighing their odds of success against you. Apparently they rank them high, because the ship attacks!
"Let'sss both be real. You're never going to pay off that debt of yoursss. Sssso, why not jussst let usss kill you and sssteal your ssstuff, and then your sssuffering can be over!"
A Hektar ship is nearby. Their captain hails you, waving cheerfully. Suddenly, a timer goes off. "Ah crap, my break issss over. Sssorry man, now I gotta do my job and rob you."
"Did you know I get a bonussss for every sssship I rob? Not from Hektar, but from money I get ssselling your garbage. Now, give me your cargo!"

event.name: NEBULA_SYLVANHOME
event.text: 이곳의 성운은 평소보다 두껍고 거센 폭풍이 몰아칩니다. 당신은 무언가를 찾기 위해 목적 없이 방황하다가 결국 근처에 표류하는 아주 작은 헥타르 포드를 발견했습니다. 당신의 스캐너로는 무슨 짓을 하든 표면을 뚫을 수 없었습니다.

당신은 포드에 더 가까이 다가가서 그것이 암호가 있는 금속 문으로 보호되어 있음을 발견합니다. 하단에는 단순히 "S.H.의 재산"이라고 쓰여 있습니다. 구조적 무결성을 위태롭게 하지 않고 그것을 열 수 있는 가능한 방법은 없으며 보안 시스템이 너무 진보하여 반군 함대가 도착하기 전에 뚫을 수 있을지 의심스러울 정도입니다. 분명히 이것을 만든 사람은 다른 이들이 물건을 엉망으로 만드는 것을 원하지 않았을 것입니다.

choice.text: (Obyn) Obyn은 이것이 무엇인지 알고있는 것 같습니다.
(Sylvan) Sylvan은 할 말이 있는 것 같습니다.

event.text: Sylvan은 포드를 힐끗 보고 멈춰섰습니다. "헤, 신경 쓰지 마쎄요 낯썬이. 씰쑤였네요. 그냥 무씨해쭈쎄요..."

choice.text: (Obyn) Obyn은 이것이 무엇인지 알고있는 것 같습니다.

event.text: 이것은 매우 이상한 광경이며 여기에 큰 의미가 있는지 궁금하지 않을 수 없습니다. 그러나 오늘은 어떤 수수께끼도 풀리지 않을 것입니다. 적어도 여기에서는요.
이것은 매우 이상한 광경이며 여기에 큰 의미가 있는지 궁금하지 않을 수 없습니다. 그러나 오늘은 어떤 수수께끼도 풀리지 않을 것입니다. 적어도 여기에서는요.
이것은 매우 이상한 광경이며 여기에 큰 의미가 있는지 궁금하지 않을 수 없습니다. 그러나 오늘은 어떤 수수께끼도 풀리지 않을 것입니다. 적어도 여기에서는요.

event.name: NEBULA_SYLVANHOME_OPEN
event.text: Obyn은 당신을 뒤로하고 문을 향해 걸어갑니다. 그는 당신이 인식하지 못하는 일련의 숫자를 입력했고 놀랍게도 포드가 열렸습니다! 어깨를 으쓱하는 오빈을 쳐다봅니다. "S.H, Sylvan의 이니셜이야. 같은 비밀번호를 쓰는 버릇이 있어서 한번 해볼까 생각했는데..."

포드의 내부는 온갖 기이한 것들로 장식되어 있습니다. 수년간의 우정으로 닳아 없어진 짙은 보라색 시트가 깔린 지저분한 침대에는 박제 동물들이 숨겨져 있습니다. 많은 장식이 이상하게 유치해 보이며 나중에 추가된 것으로 보이는 몇 가지 특이한 것들이 있습니다. 오빈은 무릎을 꿇고 작은 장신구, 'Anurak'이라는 이름이 새겨진 큰 눈의 상징이 새겨진 목걸이를 집었습니다.

Obyn은 목걸이를 조심스럽게 제자리에 갖다 놓았습니다. "우리의 오랜 친구로부터 받은 선물." 그는 멈춰 서서, 방을 둘러보았습니다. "여기가 어딘지 알아. 실반이 말해줬어, 그는 부모로부터 도망칠 필요가 있을 때마다, 그리고 나중엔 그의 형으로부터 도망칠 필요가 있을 때마다, 여기에 오곤 했다. 이곳은 그의 집 아닌 집이 되었고, 그는 계속해서 가끔 방문하곤 했다. EHG와의 결전 후, 그는 나를 여기로 데려온 적이 있어." 오빈은 침대와 그 옆에 있는 슬러그에게 맞춘 이상한 방호복을 힐끗 쳐다봤습니다. "흠. 좋은 추억이군."
당신은 특별히 아무것도 찾지 않고 방을 돌아다니던중 당신이 이제까지 본 것과는 다른 행성계가 그려진 지도가 벽에 고정되어 있는 것을 발견했습니다. 온갖 이상한 꼬리표가 흩어져 있고, 하나의 스티커 메모에는 좌표가 있습니다. 당신은 이를 자신의 지도에 기록하고, 여기에 있는 다른 것은 아무 소용이 없는 것 같으므로 포드를 나와 문을 닫았습니다.
